message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $95. I think it's a great deal, what do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  How about we meet in the middle at $90?
I'm still interested in the product, but I can only go up to $82.50. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
Bob, I'm trying to be fair, but $82.50 is too low.  My last offer is $87.50.  Take it or leave it.
I'm not willing to go any higher, so I'll offer you $80 for the product. Will you accept?
